ingredients: 1)	British Golden Promise - 11 lb ( 75 minute boil )
2)	English Chocolate Malt - 0.5 lb ( 75 minute boil )
3)	English Coffee Malt - 0.5 lb ( 75 minute boil )
4)	English Extra Dark Crystal - 0.5 lb. ( 75 minute boil )
5)	English Medium Crystal - 0.5 lb. ( 75 minute boil )
6)	Gambrinus Honey Malt - 0.5 lb. ( 75 minute boil )
7)	Fawcett Oat Malt - 0.5 lb ( 75 minute boil )
8)	English Roasted Barley - 0.75 lb ( 75 minute boil )
9)	UK Fuggle Hop Pellets 2 oz ( 60 minute boil )
12)	Dark Roast Coffee 5.5 oz ( 5 minute boil )
13)	Espresso Ground Coffee 5.5 oz ( 5 minute boil )
14)	Lactose – Milk Sugar 1 lb. ( after boil )
15)	White Labs Belgian Strong Ale WLP545 yeast
name: Just Around Midnight
